question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: Hvilken viktig historisk status fikk Jihlava i Tsjekkia i 1982?
answer: I 1982 fikk Jihlava i Tsjekkia status som en bysone med bevart historisk kjerne, kjent som et byvernede omr√•de.
answer_translated_eng: In 1982, Jihlava in the Czech Republic was granted the status of an urban zone with a preserved historical core, known as an urban conservation area.
